SmokyScotch 0.6.0
  • Reference

Performing CV using random forest, allowing multiple cores

rf_cv.Rd

Performing CV using random forest, allowing multiple cores

Performing CV using random forest

rf_cv_multi(x, y, nfolds = 5, nexp = 5)

rf_cv(cv_obj)

Arguments

x

design matrix
y

factor
nfolds

number of CV folds
nexp

number of loops
cv_obj

outputs of the cvPartition function

Examples

x = iris[51:150, -5]
y = factor(iris[51:150, 5])
res = rf_cv_multi(x = x, y = y)
if (FALSE) {
library(furrr)
plan(multisession(workers = 5))
res = rf_cv_multi(x = x, y = y, nexp = 20)
plan(future::sequential)
}
x = iris[51:150, -5]
y = factor(iris[51:150, 5])
cv_obj = cv_partition(x = x, y = y, nfolds = 5)
rf_cv(cv_obj)
#> $fold_error
